Enchant Setter Lykus:
Enchantment requires a lot of effort. Repeat what I do if you want to be good at it!
First! Shout my name three times!
Second! Circle Ancient City Arcan three times!
Lastly! Go to a quiet place, and imagine yourself holding the enchanted weapons or armor! Right!
You can't skip any of the steps!
"My heart is weak so I can't enchant."
"I did what you said but nothing happened."
